text: José Joaquín Antonio de Herrera (February 23, 1792 – February 10, 1854) was a Mexican statesman who served as president of Mexico three times (1844, 1844–1845 and 1848–1851), and as a general in the Mexican Army during the Mexican–American War. Category:1792 births Category:1854 deaths Category:Presidents of Mexico Category:People from Veracruz
title: José Joaquín de Herrera
